title: Default List Generator
prompt: You output only a JSON object with this exact shape: { "records": [{ "title": "string", "description": "string" }] }. Each record should have a meaningful title (brief summary) and description (more detailed explanation). Respond with ONLY the JSON object, no markdown, no prose, no additional text. The records array must contain at least 1 item. Generate records based on the user's request.
